title: Little Mouse
author: Little Mouse
content: JOIN THE EXCLUSIVE Bitcoin Price Prediction Contest!Rules1. Predict the price of Bitcoin on 20th October at 06:00 UTC.2. The last date of submission is 16th October at 23:59:59 UTC.3. Closest prediction will get 2 mBTC.4. In case of multiple winners, the prize pool will be shared among the winners.5. Bitcointalk account must be created before this thread creation.6. You aren't allowed to edit the prediction post.7. The reward will be directly sent to your BTC address.Post formatCode:Nitrobetting userid: Prediction:
